title: Workshop on Designing Customized Learning Experiences for Digital-Age Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool competency and language education experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented learning design through integration with current practitioners' work contexts

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language learning activities using digital tools.
Learners can analyze formative assessment data to improve learning experiences two or more times.
Learners can develop one or more language learning scenarios reflecting real workplace situations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
